title: Ep - 160 - BEHIND THE SCENES OF SELLING SUNSET AND MARRIED AT FIRST SIGHT / HANNAH FROM SUMMER HOUSE
description:
Kimberly Goodman is a veteran show runner and producer. She discusses behind the scenes of Selling Sunset on Netflix, Ladies of London on Bravo, and Married at First Sight on Lifetime. 


Hannah Berner is a cast member on Bravo’s Summer House. She talks about how she was cast for the show, what it is really like living in the house in the Hamptons, and if she ever worries about parts of her life playing back for years in syndication. 


Doris Bessudo from Mexican Dynasties on Bravo explains how the production company cast her, behind the scenes of the families featured, and what didn’t make it to air. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

http://www.loveandknuckles.com
